data_table.description: Clinic Exam Dates, Sex, Age at Exam, Original Exam 1 - Exam 31, Offspring Exam 1 - Exam 8, Generation 3 Exam 1 - Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 1 - Exam 2 from 1948 through 2011. The age at each clinic exam was calculated using the clinic exam date and the date of birth. Clinic exam dates were calculated using the number of days between exam 1 and subsequent exams.

variable.name: AGE1
variable.comment: The formula used to calculate age at 1st exam: AGE1 = int((DATE1-dob)/265.25)

variable.name: AGE2
variable.comment: The formula used to calculate age at 2nd exam: AGE2 = int((DATE2-dob)/265.25)

variable.name: ATT3
variable.value: Exam for this cohort has not been completed

variable.name: AGE3
variable.comment: The formula used to calculate age at 3rd exam: AGE3 = int((DATE3-dob)/265.25)

variable.value: Exam for this cohort has not been completed
